attributes.action: Increase Highlife Inverness Swimming Pool Opening Hours
attributes.additional_details: High Life Highland declares that it develops and promotes opportunities in culture, learning, sport, leisure, health and wellbeing throughout the whole of the Highlands, for both residents and visitors. The recent changes made by the council will negatively impact the health and wellbeing of the local community.
attributes.background: Please sign this petition in support of increasing the Inverness Highlife swimming pool opening hours. The Highland Council have recently reduced the leisure swimming pool opening hours during school term time. Thank you for your support.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the Inverness Highlife swimming pool are a matter for The Highland Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly: https://www.highland.gov.uk/info/670/consultations_complaints_and_compliments/622/consultations_and_petitions/2
